body:

* :arrow_forward: To **apply** this plan, comment:
    * `atlantis apply -p development`
* :put_litter_in_its_place: To **delete** this plan click [here](https://7482-177-33-139-44.ngrok.io/lock?id=alexbaptista%252Fterraform-atlantis-review%252F.%252Fdev)
* :repeat: To **plan** this project again, comment:
    * `atlantis plan -p development`
</details>
Plan: 1 to add, 0 to change, 0 to destroy.

---
* :fast_forward: To **apply** all unapplied plans from this pull request, comment:
    * `atlantis apply`
* :put_litter_in_its_place: To delete all plans and locks for the PR, comment:
    * `atlantis unlock`
